resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74016</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>336122ab-1d2c-11d8-89de-a9988494fe35#1#12</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az ősi Itália</string>
            <string language="en">The ancient Italy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das alte Italien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Italie antique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Italy antigo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Italia antica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αρχαία Ιταλία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Italia antigua</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A földrajzi környezet és az itt élő népek bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">Illustration of the geographical environment and the peoples who live here</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">alapítás,  Romulus,  Remus,  latin,  szabin,  szabell,  </string>
            <string language="en">establishment,  Romulus,  Remus,  latin,  Sabine,  Sabell,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abbildung der geographischen Umgebung und die 
Völker, die hier leben</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Illustration de l'environnement géographique et 
les peuples qui vivent ici</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ilustração do ambiente geográfico e os povos 
que vivem aqui</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Illustrazione dell'ambiente geografico e la gente
che vivono qui</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απεικόνιση του γεωγραφικού περιβάλλοντος και των λαών 
που ζουν εδώ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ilustración del ambiente geográfico y la gente 
que viven aquí</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einrichtung, Romulus, Remus, Latein, Sabine, Sabell,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">établissement, Romulus, Remus, latin, Sabine, Sabell,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estabelecimento, Romulus, Remus, latin, Sabine, Sabell,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">istituzione, Romulus, Remus, Latino, Sabine, Sabell,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καθιέρωση, Romulus, Remus, λατινικά, Sabine, 
Sabell,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">establecimiento, Romulus, Remus, latín, Sabine, 
Sabell,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">14-15</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:

end:vcard</entity>

            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:
fn:

end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>

        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
